settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Water, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Glycerin, Coco-Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Hydroxyacetophenone, Salicylic Acid, Tetradecene, Hexadecene, Butylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Artemisia Vulgaris Extract, Abies Sibirica Oil, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, Hexylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Lycium Chinense Root Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Extract, Pentasodium Pentetate, Tocopherol, Coptis Chinensis Root Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Phellodendron Amurense Bark Extract, Astragalus Membranaceus Root Extract, Propanediol, Artemisia Capillaris Extract, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Glycolipids, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Limonene, Citral




Note: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW


STEP 1

Press pump once or twice to dispense product into palm or loofah.


STEP 2

Massage over the body until a dense foam forms, then rinse thoroughly with warm water.

settings.text:
1. Wash your worries away without stripping the skin, leaving you feeling fresh and revitalized.
  2. Cleanse and revitalize tired body skin with this exclusive Body Wash.
  3. Suamel, a bioremediator that is used to clean ocean pollution without disturbing native wildlife, plays a key role in this formula by cleansing body skin without disturbing your delicate skin barrier or balance.
  4. Remove fine dust particles, sweat, and sebum with ease, all while depositing rich, hydrating ingredients, like hyaluronic acid and collagen.
  5. Step out of the shower with healthier skin than when you stepped in.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
